Key Match Events: Blake Perkins robbed Noelvi Marte of a homer to end the sixth inning of a 4-4 game.
Rookie Jackson Chourio hit a go-ahead homer in the ninth inning.
Jake Bauers made a diving grab of a hard-hit grounder off the bat of Ty France to end the game.
Willy Adames hit his third homer in as many games, his 27th roundtripper of the season.
Spencer Steer had a two-run single in the fifth inning.
Amed Rosario tied the game with a 420-foot two-run homer in the sixth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: David Bell expressed frustration after the Reds lost their third straight game to the Brewers.
David Bell commented on the Brewers' strong defensive plays and their ability to win the game.
David Bell discussed the importance of making split-second decisions as a runner at third base.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd was treated to a show in the ninth inning followed by a concert by Shaquille O'Neal.
Justin Wilson gave up the go-ahead homer to Jackson Chourio and took the loss.
Aaron Ashby worked two scoreless innings over the seventh and eighth to earn the win.
Fernando Cruz, Buck Farmer, David Buchanan, and Tony Santillan combined to strike out 14 Milwaukee batters.
